author: Jeff Leake & Nick Padon
description: This repo is meant to represent a 'canonical' Python project, where some of the infrastructure details associated with styling, linting, testing, and test coverage are handled so you don't have to think about them.

author: Jeff Leake & Nick Padon
description: This repo is meant to represent a 'canonical' Python project, where some of the infrastructure details associated with styling, linting, testing, and test coverage are handled so you don't have to think about them.
shell_exec: pipenv install --dev & pipenv run pre-commit install
